name: Tri-peaks Solitaire Story
description:
As a true fan of Classic Solitaire,you can’t miss the Tri-Peaks! Train your brain in a funny and easy way with this Tri-peaks!

The aim of Tri-peaks Solitaire Story is to move all the cards from the peaks. You need to tap on the cards that are one rank high or lower than the base card. As soon as a row of cards has been removed, new cards will appear and will be added into the game. If you have no moves left, tap on the row of cards next to your active card to get a new one. In case you get stuck you have one Joker which you can use anytime! But use it wisely , you never know when you need it the most. Once you have cleared all the stock pile cards, you will get some bonus points.

Relaxing and simple game play
No, when you want to gain the three stars, play quickly and make big combos! And you will be familiar with the Tri-peaks Solitaire Story in a few minutes and more than happy to finish the challenges .

Special "bonus" cards
In case you get stuck, you have one Joker which you can use anytime! If used wisely, it can change your bad situation into a good one.

-----Features-----
Play it anywhere!
Unlimited undo function
Rewards for your progress and achievements
Exciting & challenging Solitaire game
Classic card game with a fantastic theme

If you love the Solitaire,Tri-peaks is here, just click and play!
